system.description: At 2nd level, you receive training in the spiritual aspects of your druidic tradition. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.eiek2vbzwijd0qac]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip and it does not count against your cantrips known. The @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.xnm2hvlfzqp792tz]{Bless} spell is added to the druid spell list for you, and you gain proficiency with the Religion and Insight skills.
